import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import Platforms from '../Platforms/Platforms' import {useSelectr, useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {LoadGenres, CleanRta, CleanFilterGames} from '../../redux/actions' export const Form = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(LoadGenres()) //Cargar generos al actualiar return () => { /// por si entro y salio rapido me aseguro tener limpio rta dispatch(CleanRta()) dispatch(CleanFilterGames()) } }, [dispatch]) return (
) }
